name: Input a game prototype
description:
Input is a puzzle game prototype made in game maker.

your task is simple get the golden cube to the gold floor tile. Use the arrow keys to move your cube but be careful all the floor tiles will move in the opposite direction the cube is moving!

The game features 25 puzzles in 4 parts with special tile types to help keep things fresh and challenging.

This was made in game maker 8 so the system requirements are Fairly light and should run on most machines, the game it's self only uses about 40 megs of memory and runs in a 720P windowed mode.

The devious gents logo is from my now defunct app development company.
